title: Cookie Policy - SalaryWise.io
description: How we use cookies and your privacy choices
keywords: cookies, privacy, cookie policy, cookie settings

intro.paragraph1: This Cookie Policy explains how SalaryWise.io uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content.
intro.paragraph2: By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us remember your preferences, improve site functionality, and provide you with a better user experience. Cookies can be categorized as essential, analytics, functional, and marketing cookies.

cookieTypes.purpose: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core features like page navigation, secure access to account areas, and remembering your cookie preferences.

cookieTypes.description: Help us understand how visitors use our site
cookieTypes.purpose: These cookies collect information about how you use our website, which pages you visit, and if you encounter any errors. This helps us improve our website's performance and user experience. We use Google Analytics for this purpose.
These cookies remember your preferences and settings to provide enhanced features and personalized content. They may also help us remember your language preference or calculator settings.
These cookies are used to deliver relevant advertisements and track the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns. They may be set by third-party advertising networks including Google AdSense.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.description: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies

cookieManagement.title: Managing Your Cookie Preferences

methods.description: Most web browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. You can usually find these settings in the 'Options' or 'Preferences' menu.
steps: Find the privacy or security section
Choose to block or delete cookies

methods.description: When you first visit our site, you'll see a cookie consent banner where you can accept or reject non-essential cookies.
For specific third-party services, you can use their opt-out mechanisms listed in the Third-Party Cookies section.

cookieManagement.note: Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our website and limit your user experience.

dataRetention.title: Cookie Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Different types of cookies have different lifespans. Session cookies are deleted when you close your browser, while persistent cookies remain until they expire or are deleted. We regularly review and update our cookie practices to ensure compliance with privacy regulations.

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: Questions About Cookies?
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies or this policy, please contact us.

universalDisclaimer.title: Important Notice
universalDisclaimer.content: The calculators and salary tools on this website are provided for informational purposes only. We do our best to provide accurate and up-to-date information, but we cannot guarantee the results. Actual salaries, taxes, and deductions may vary depending on your individual situation and local regulations. Users should not rely solely on this website for financial, legal, or tax decisions. Always consult with a qualified professional for advice. By using this website, you agree that SalaryWise.io is not responsible for any decisions or actions taken based on the calculator results.
